title: NAMI BUFF IN WATER
body: {{champion:267}}   I think Nami should get some sort of buff while in the water. It only makes sense that maybe she should move faster or be a little bit stronger when in her natural element. She a mermaid!

replies.body: i mean... it makes sense that she can go fast through the river lol
I still don't get why she can fly...
Where? I just read her lore, but it doesn't explain what she is flying.

{{champion:267}} While I think the idea is cute (just like champs with sunglasses having resistance to Leona) I feel like this will make some people want to play jungle Nami and then we're in all sorts of trouble ;) ;)

LOL. People do silly things all the time like play ADC Ahri :) for no reason at all but, we should let that stop us from making cool changes to the game. I think this buff would help when you have team fights in the river and i think it just makes sense. She's a mermaid.

{{champion:267}} Was just a joke. I suggested this a long time ago and Rito had no interest or didn't see it. Hidden passives are fun to find :)

Does that mean J4 and Shyvana should get bonus damage to Dragon?  It's in their lore that they kill dragons.  Should teemo get additional attack bonuses when he's in the grass?  He is a stealth scout after all...
I think Shyvana should take less damage from the dragon. I don't see why fire would hurt her all that much.

Something funny but very unlikely to be useful.

"Swimming against the current!" Nami is in the River.
"Flopping around" Nami is on dry land.
I don't think it will make a huge impact on the game but it would be nice either way for me as a fan of Nami.

I doesn't have to be a movement buff. What if the water increased the range of her spells : ).  It wouldn't really give her much of advantage throughout the game but it would be helpful when going for drag or baron as a team. Or What if the water made her spells do more damage (slightly like 3%) idk. I just think if nid can get a buff when moving through the bushes Nami should get one while in the water.
Why are we talking just about nami? What about fizz? Fizz could use a buff like that. And while we are at it lets add nautilus to the list.
No, only special champs like nid get unfair bonuses using the environment
